ModuleTranslator module¶

class ModuleTranslator.ModuleTranslator[source]¶

Bases: object

Class used to translate the raw data harvested from the modules into processed data ready to be sent to the API

GAS_REGEX = 'LPG:([0-9]+)ppm[ \t]+CO:([0-9]+)ppm[ \t]+SMOKE:([0-9]+)ppm'¶
static raw_module_data_to_json(raw_data)[source]¶

Translates a line from the Gas detection module into a JSON string :param raw_data: a raw Bytes line read from the gas module :return: either None or an array of JSON Strings containing the data ready to be sent to the API
